page.title: 13BUS SERVICES FROM HOGNASTON
page.content: The coach company run several services around the area.These services travel round many villages to take people into the larger towns such as Matlock,Wirksworth,Ashbourne and Derby.They are used particularly by people who cannot drive,people who are old and people who are too young to drive. During the school terms the firm runs special buses to take children to,and from school.They are also used to transport children to swimming lessons in Ashbourne or Matlock. Coaches are also hired out with drivers for private outings. The usual bus services are to Wirksworth and Ashbourne on Monday, Wednesday,Thursday and Friday,to Asbourne and Matlock on Tuesday and Saturday,and to Derby on Friday.
